description: This Dart source file defines the AuthRepository class responsible for handling authentication-related API calls such as login, fetching current user info, and registration, in a Flutter or Dart-based project.

classes.name: AuthRepository
classes.description: Provides methods for user authentication: login, retrieving current user info, and registration via HTTP requests.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending email and password to the auth API endpoint, returns a TokenResponse object on success.

methods.name: getMe
methods.description: Retrieves current user profile information using an access token.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and optional full name, returns a UserRead object on success.
